mapper.select: select * from camping_room where cs_no=#{cs_no} and cr_type=#{campingType}

select cs_no, cs_name, cs_tel, cs_addr_head, cs_addr_remain, cs_url, cs_account, cs_camp_fname, cs_map_fname, cs_glamping_cnt, cs_caravan_cnt, cs_autocamping_cnt, cs_theme, cs_fac, cs_detail, mb_id from camping_spot where cs_no = #{cs_no}

select cs_name name, A.cs_no no, A.price price, A.avg rate, cs_addr_head addr_head, cs_addr_remain addr_remain, cs_detail detail, cs_tel tel, cs_theme theme, cs_fac fac, cs_camp_fname camp_fname from (select cr.cs_no cs_no, min(cr_price) price, avg(cre_rate) avg from camping_room cr, camping_review cre where cr.cs_no = cre.cs_no and cr_type=#{campingType} group by cr.cs_no) A, camping_spot cs where A.cs_no = cs.cs_no and cs.cs_no = #{no}
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme1} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme2} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme3} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme4} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme5} || '%'
and cs_theme like '%' || #{theme6} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility1} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility2} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility3} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility4} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility5} || '%'
and cs_fac like '%' || #{facility6} || '%'
and A.price >= #{lowPrice}
and A.price <= #{highPrice}

select cs_no no from camping_spot
where cs_name like '%' || #{keyword} || '%' or cs_addr_head like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
minus select a.cs_no from (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from reserve_search where cr_type = #{campingType} and rs_date = to_date(#{validDate1}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by cs_no) a, (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from camping_room where cr_type=#{campingType} group by cs_no) b where a.cs_no = b.cs_no and a.cnt = b.cnt
minus select a.cs_no from (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from reserve_search where cr_type = #{campingType} and rs_date = to_date(#{validDate2}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by cs_no) a, (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from camping_room where cr_type=#{campingType} group by cs_no) b where a.cs_no = b.cs_no and a.cnt = b.cnt
minus select a.cs_no from (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from reserve_search where cr_type = #{campingType} and rs_date = to_date(#{validDate3}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by cs_no) a, (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from camping_room where cr_type=#{campingType} group by cs_no) b where a.cs_no = b.cs_no and a.cnt = b.cnt
minus select a.cs_no from (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from reserve_search where cr_type = #{campingType} and rs_date = to_date(#{validDate4}, 'yyyy-mm-dd') group by cs_no) a, (select cs_no, count(cr_no) cnt from camping_room where cr_type=#{campingType} group by cs_no) b where a.cs_no = b.cs_no and a.cnt = b.cnt
